Params: {2: 'Kamui', 3: "They keep coming out... It seems they won't stop at all...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Your vital fluid is leaking. Are you okay?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Inver-Device is still intact, I can continue to fight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I now see why they say you have a high affinity for combat. You practically throw your life out there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '"Life" isn\'t an apt description for us Constructs.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Even if the frame is damaged, after repairs and maintenance, we can continue on after a reboot.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "It's always been this way. But even so... is it really enough to make you put your life on the line...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "Kamui, we're desperate... for help... need... support...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Give me your coordinate! I'll be right there!", 4: '1'}
